description: Algolia gathers user's click/conversion events to build user profiles for personalization and A/B testing. This field group properties aligns with the Algolia user profile structure.

name.description: The Facet Name is configured as a searchable facet for filtering.

value.description: The Facet Value is a specific value of the Facet Name customers use to filter their search results.
value.title: Attribute Value

score.description: The Weighted Score is calculated daily based on the customer click/conversion events.
score.title: Weighted Score

indices.description: The Index/Indices return an array of index/indices where the facet has been configured.
indices.title: Search Indices
